name: ALD Image Gallery
author: Hossain Md. Awlad

sections.description:
Create 100% responsive FREE WordPress photo gallery in moment. This plugin will add a Simple image gallery. ALD Gallery is a wordpress image gallery plugin. You can create multiple image gallery with multiple image url. And show the gallery in wordpress frontend supported by Lightcase. Supports in all themes with jquery.

Major features in ALD Image Gallery include:

  • Totally Free Package
  • Add image galleries up to you want
  • Delete image galleries you want
  • Add images in gallery by adding image url or by uploading images
  • Add image title & caption for showing
  • Show galleries in your wordpress frontend by shortcode
  • Create unlimited galleries as you want
  • Shortcode supports attribute like image height, width and image limits

Frontend

  • Image gallery animation at frontend
  • Gallery slideshow option
  • Image caption
  • Responsive images to any device

Backend

  • Add image galleries up to you want
  • Delete image galleries you want
  • Add images in gallery by adding image url or by uploading images
  • Add image title & caption for showing
  • Image uploading option with image link for gallery Images
  • Easy to use wordpress interface

Shortcode

For using shortcode in post or page, simply use this formate.

[aldgallery gallery=”your_gallery_id” width=”150px” height=”120px” limit=”10″ slideshow=”1″]
sections.installation:
Upload the ALD Image Gallery plugin to your blog, Activate it.
1, 2: You’re done!
sections.changelog:
2.0 (Release Date – 18 November 2016)

  • Image gallery animation at frontend
  • Gallery slideshow option
  • Image uploading option with image link for gallery Images
  • New admin interface
  • Gallery list pagination on admin panel
  • Structural coding for plugin

1.3

Release Date – 11 March 2016

1.2

Release Date – 18 February 2016
* Initially released for working in WordPress 4.2.2
